recipesJson.name: Hop Heads
recipesJson.author: Kopel
recipesJson.description:
A bright, hoppy pineapple with hints of pink grapefruit. 

FLV Pineapple is a super clean, straight forward pineapple flavor. Accented by the FLV Jackfruit you get a little more juiciness and some super ripe fruit forward. This helps to balance the hops at such a high %. Hints of grapefruit provided by the always lovely FLV Pink Guava.
